about_the_game:
Unleash the wrath of the red dragon - and score a massive mountain of Loyalty at the same time.

Includes

Maelforge Broodling
Make this ferocious and fiery fiend into you newest mount.

2,000,000 Loyalty
Unlock awesome rewards by increasing your Loyalty.

Forgemaster’s Inferno Helm
This helm is on fire – literally.

40-slot Bag
Fill your pockets with everything you’ll ever need.
